author: seamonkey82
content: Asking here since the answer might vary from client to client,.  How do each of the Shapella-ready CL clients respond to a bls-to-execution change pre-fork?

author: barnabasbusa
content: Some clients support it, e.g prysm/lodestar/lighthouse, and some don't support it before the activation slot, like nimbus/tteku.

author: pietjepuk
content: "support" as in, allow you to put it in some local queue. Broadcast will only happen after the fork, and I presume incoming messages are ignored until the fork (I know for sure LH does ignore them pre-fork, not sure about the other clients)
